definition: Percentage of active sessions that progressed to analysis phase, calculated as (Analyzed Sessions / Active Sessions) * 100
Percentage of active sessions where evaluation was completed, calculated as (Sum of eval_completed * 100) divided by Sum of active_sessions
Total count of active sessions in the soundbox evaluation system for payout and settlement operations.
Total count of sessions that have been processed through the analysis phase of the MHD evaluation system.
Total count of sessions that have successfully completed the entire wealth evaluation process
Mental Health Detection - the overall evaluation system and process for analyzing sessions
Customer Support Team entity identifier used to filter data for specific business units or teams.
Average evaluation score converted to percentage, calculated as (AVG(avg_eval_score)) * 100, representing overall quality assessment of customer service interactions.
Percentage of customer sessions handled by bot without escalation to human agents. Calculated as (Total Active Sessions - FD Tickets) divided by Total Active Sessions, multiplied by 100.
Customer satisfaction percentage based on feedback responses, calculated as Happy responses divided by total responses (Happy + Sad) multiplied by 100
business_alias: Customer Satisfaction Rate, Mean Satisfaction, MSAT also referred as Customer Satisfaction, Customer Satisfaction Percentage, Customer Satisfaction Rate, also referred as MSAT, Customer Satisfaction Score, Mobile Satisfaction Percentage, Mobile Satisfaction

definition: Percentage of evaluations that were rated as bad, calculated as (Sum of eval_score_bad * 100) divided by (Sum of eval_score_good + Sum of eval_score_bad)
Count of tickets escalated to human agents (First Desk tickets), representing cases that couldn't be resolved by automated systems.
business_alias: Front Desk Tickets, FD also referred as Front Desk, First Desk Tickets

definition: Count of positive customer satisfaction responses or ratings indicating satisfied customers.
Count of negative customer satisfaction responses or ratings indicating dissatisfied customers.
Count of positive evaluation scores given to customer service interactions.
Count of negative evaluation scores given to customer service interactions.
Collection of performance indicators measuring service quality including evaluation scores, bot containment, customer satisfaction, and evaluation quality distribution.
Count of positive sentiment responses or interactions from users in the MHD evaluation system
Count of negative sentiment responses or interactions from users in the MHD evaluation system
Count of neutral sentiment responses or interactions from users in the MHD evaluation system
Percentage of positive user sentiment out of total user sentiment, calculated as sum of positive user sentiment divided by total sentiment (positive + negative + neutral) multiplied by 100
Percentage of negative user sentiment out of total user sentiment, calculated as sum of negative user sentiment divided by total sentiment (positive + negative + neutral) multiplied by 100
Percentage of neutral user sentiment out of total user sentiment, calculated as sum of neutral user sentiment divided by total sentiment (positive + negative + neutral) multiplied by 100
Collection of metrics measuring and analyzing user sentiment distribution including positive, negative, and neutral sentiment percentages
Customer service evaluation framework measuring multiple dimensions including empathy, resolution achievement, and response relevance for quality assessment
business_alias: Mental Health Dashboard Evaluation, MHD, Mobile Handheld Device Evaluation

definition: Count of users expressing positive sentiment towards the evaluated system or service
Count of users expressing negative sentiment towards the evaluated system or service
Count of users expressing neutral sentiment towards the evaluated system or service
Entity identifier for different systems or services being evaluated, such as p4bsoundbox and p4bAIBot
Count of users who experienced neutral sentiment change, representing users with no significant positive or negative reaction
Sum of positive user sentiment changes aggregated by day, representing users whose sentiment improved or became more favorable.
Count of users who experienced negative sentiment change, indicating users with decreased satisfaction or unfavorable reactions
Collection of metrics measuring changes in user attitudes and feelings, including Positive Change #, Negative Change #, and Neutral Change #.
Overall user sentiment analysis metrics including Neutral Change #, Positive Change #, and Negative Change # for tracking user satisfaction changes

Average empathy score across conversations, converted to percentage scale (0-100), measuring how well the AI demonstrates emotional understanding and appropriate responsiveness to customer emotions and concerns.
Average resolution achievement rate for customer service cases, calculated as AVG(avg_resolution_achieved) * 100 to express as a percentage, measuring how effectively issues are resolved

Average relevance score of customer service responses, calculated as AVG(avg_response_relevance_score) * 100 to express as a percentage, measuring how relevant and appropriate responses are to customer inquiries
business_alias: Average Response Relevance, Avg Response Relevance Score

definition: AI chatbot or voice assistant system being evaluated for customer service performance
Collection of metrics used to assess AI chatbot performance including empathy, resolution achievement, and response relevance
Evaluation system for soundbox and AI bot customer service interactions, tracking quality metrics across multiple performance dimensions.
Percentage of completed evaluations where the bot provided repetitive responses, calculated as (agent_response_repetition count / total eval_completed) * 100
Percentage of completed evaluations where the bot failed to execute function calls properly, calculated as (function_call_failed / eval_completed) * 100
Percentage of completed evaluations where the bot failed to correctly detect user intent, calculated as (intent_incoherence_count / total eval_completed) * 100
Total count of bot evaluations that have been completed and are used as the denominator for performance percentage calculations
Count of instances where the bot agent provided repetitive or redundant responses during evaluations
Count of instances where the bot failed to successfully execute required function calls during evaluations
Count of instances where intent detection was incoherent, failed, or produced incorrect results during evaluations
Collection of percentage-based metrics measuring different aspects of conversational bot failures including repetition, function failures, and intent detection issues
Total count of positive customer feedback responses received during sessions.
Total count of negative customer feedback responses received during sessions.
Total count of tickets or cases that required human agent intervention or handover.
business_alias: Agent Handover Tickets, AH Tickets, AH tickets, AH Tickets, also referred as Agent Handover Tickets

definition: Total count of service tickets created for customer issues or requests
Percentage of active sessions that provided feedback, calculated as (Happy Feedback + Sad Feedback) divided by Active Sessions multiplied by 100
Percentage of active sessions that required agent intervention, calculated as Agent Tickets divided by Active Sessions multiplied by 100
business_alias: AH Rate, AH %, Agent Handover Rate

definition: Percentage of active sessions that resulted in service ticket creation, calculated as Service Tickets * 100 / Active Sessions
A grouping of metrics that tracks the count of users experiencing different types of sentiment changes, including neutral, positive, and negative changes.
Level 1 evaluation system for soundbox customer service interactions, providing summary metrics for quality assessment
Base empathy score metric used in calculations, measuring empathy levels in customer service interactions before percentage conversion.
Base resolution achieved metric from the database, representing raw resolution effectiveness scores before percentage conversion
Base response relevance score metric from the soundbox evaluation data, used to calculate the average response relevance percentage
Collection of customer service evaluation metrics including empathy scores, resolution achievement, and response relevance used to assess service quality.
Average evaluation score across all sessions, calculated as Average of avg_eval_score multiplied by 100 to get percentage
Average score measuring how relevant LLM responses are to user queries, calculated as Average of avg_response_relevance_score multiplied by 100
Average empathy score of LLM responses, measuring how empathetic the chatbot responses are, expressed as a percentage
Percentage of positive user sentiment changes during conversations, calculated as (Sum of positive_user_sentiment * 100) divided by total sentiment responses
business_alias: Positive Sentiment Change %, Positive Sentiment Change Rate, Positive Sentiment Change Percentage

definition: Average percentage of issue resolution achieved in conversations, calculated as Average of avg_resolution_achieved multiplied by 100
Average topic drift score measuring how much conversations deviate from intended topics, expressed as percentage (Average of topic drift * 100)
Collection of Level 1 Large Language Model performance metrics including quality scores, satisfaction measures, and failure rates
business_alias: LLM Level 1 Performance Metrics, LLM Level 1 Metrics

definition: Collection of key performance indicators measuring MHD system quality on a daily basis, including evaluation scores, bot containment, satisfaction, and negative feedback share
Mental Health Detection evaluation process metrics including session analysis and completion tracking.
Summary metrics tracking the evaluation workflow including Active Sessions, Analyzed Sessions, Eval Completed, and their completion percentages
